You could lose all of your capital.</em></div><div class="dslot text-right d-none d-lg-block" style="min-height: 60px;" did="9"></div><div class="dslot text-center d-lg-none" style="min-height: 60px;" did="17"></div><div class="featured-frame"><img fetchpriority="high" width="1200" height="673" src="https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101647/1762597006-stock-image_optimized-23.jpg" class="attachment-post-thumbnail size-post-thumbnail wp-post-image" alt="XRP Price Prediction: Post-Swell Volatility - Traders Watch for Confirmation of the XRP Death Cross and Next Move" decoding="async" srcset="https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101647/1762597006-stock-image_optimized-23.jpg 1200w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101647/1762597006-stock-image_optimized-23-300x168.jpg 300w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101647/1762597006-stock-image_optimized-23-1024x574.jpg 1024w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101647/1762597006-stock-image_optimized-23-768x431.jpg 768w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101647/1762597006-stock-image_optimized-23-150x84.jpg 150w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101647/1762597006-stock-image_optimized-23-450x252.jpg 450w" sizes="(max-width: 1200px) 100vw, 1200px" /></div>
                            <p><a href="https://cryptonews.com/coins/ripple/"><strong>XRP</strong></a> recovered 4.59% Friday to $2.3140 as spot ETF momentum intensified, with multiple issuers filing amended S-1s to bypass SEC delays from the ongoing <a href="https://cryptonews.com/news/government-shutdown-stalls-crypto-bill-senate-vote/">government shutdown</a>, which had earlier affected the bullish <a href="https://cryptonews.com/price-predictions/xrp-price-prediction/">XRP price predictions</a>. </p><p>Canary Capital <a href="https://x.com/CanaryFunds/status/1986836450394964418" target="_blank">removed</a> the delaying amendment language, potentially positioning for the November 13 launch. </p><p>Bitwise, Franklin Templeton, and 21Shares followed, racing for first-to-market advantage.</p><p>The token trades 7.72% down for November following October’s 11.84% decline, leaving the price below the 50-day and 200-day EMAs as traders monitor death cross confirmation. Post-Swell volatility drove a 36% correction from $3.60 peaks.</p><h2 class="wp-block-heading"><span id="h-etf-race-accelerates-through-shutdown-loophole">ETF Race Accelerates Through Shutdown Loophole</span></h2><span class="replacer"></span><p><a href="https://cryptonews.com/news/sec-sets-new-crypto-etf-standards-dozen-major-tokens-could-qualify-by-october/">SEC Generic Listing Standards</a> permit commodity-based ETF listings without requiring traditional 19b-4 approval, which can take up to 240 days. </p><p>By removing delaying language, issuers can launch after 20 days without SEC queries. The strategy circumvents shutdown-linked delays as the SEC operates with a skeleton staff.</p><div class="dslot row mb-20 " did="5"></div><p>Canary Capital gains a potential first-mover advantage, as competitors are launching shortly after.</p><figure class="wp-block-embed is-type-rich is-provider-twitter wp-block-embed-twitter"><div class="wp-block-embed__wrapper">
<blockquote class="twitter-tweet" data-width="550" data-dnt="true"><p lang="en" dir="ltr">Get ready: Canary XRP ETF (XRPC) is coming soon.<br><br>🔗More info available in prospectus: <a href="https://t.co/y66AAqoGil" target="_blank">https://t.co/y66AAqoGil</a> <a href="https://t.co/h8tewn25Jd" target="_blank">pic.twitter.com/h8tewn25Jd</a></p>— Canary Capital (@CanaryFunds) <a href="https://twitter.com/CanaryFunds/status/1986836450394964418?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw" target="_blank">November 7, 2025</a></blockquote><div class="lazyload" data-script="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js"></div>
</div></figure><p>CoinShares, Grayscale, and WisdomTree await reopening unless filing amended S-1s.</p><p>NovaDius Wealth Management President Nate Geraci called potential launches the “<strong><em>final nail in coffin of previous anti-crypto regulators,</em></strong>” highlighting the shift from the SEC’s Ripple legal battle to Paul Atkins’ Project Crypto initiative.</p><h2 class="wp-block-heading"><span id="h-death-cross-concerns-battle-ichimoku-strength">Death Cross Concerns Battle Ichimoku Strength</span></h2><span class="replacer"></span><p>XRP tests support at $2.32 with a bearish projection targeting the $1.90-$2.00 zone, representing a 14-17% additional downside. </p><p>The 50-day and 200-day EMAs converged ahead of a potential death cross. Immediate support sits at $2.60-$2.70, with the critical zone at $2.00-$2.55.</p><figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img decoding="async" width="1024" height="711" src="https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-104-1024x711.png" alt="XRP Price Prediction: Post-Swell Volatility - Traders Watch for Confirmation of the XRP Death Cross and Next Move" class="wp-image-449644" srcset="https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-104-1024x711.png 1024w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-104-300x208.png 300w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-104-768x533.png 768w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-104-1536x1066.png 1536w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-104-150x104.png 150w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-104-450x312.png 450w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-104.png 2048w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px"><figcaption class="wp-element-caption">Source: <a href="https://x.com/ali_charts/status/1986985273457336763?s=20" target="_blank">X/@ali_charts</a></figcaption></figure><p>However, quarterly Ichimoku Cloud analysis <a href="https://x.com/matthughes13/status/1986958656538042706?s=20" target="_blank">reveals</a> XRP has built a base above the 3-month conversion and baseline for the first time in history. </p><p>The structural strength suggests a durable advance despite the current 18.87% quarterly decline, contrasting with historical brief rallies that quickly reversed.</p><figure class="wp-block-embed is-type-rich is-provider-twitter wp-block-embed-twitter"><div class="wp-block-embed__wrapper">
<blockquote class="twitter-tweet" data-width="550" data-dnt="true"><p lang="en" dir="ltr">The 3 month Ichimoku Cloud demonstrates how powerful <a href="https://twitter.com/search?q=%24XRP&src=ctag&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw" target="_blank">$XRP</a>'s bull trend actually is<br><br>It has never built a base above the 3 month conversion or baseline in its history and its doing it now for the past year <a href="https://t.co/UekUxm6W4x" target="_blank">pic.twitter.com/UekUxm6W4x</a></p>— The Great Mattsby (@matthughes13) <a href="https://twitter.com/matthughes13/status/1986958656538042706?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw" target="_blank">November 8, 2025</a></blockquote><div class="lazyload" data-script="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js"></div>
</div></figure><p>The near-term trajectory continues toward $1.90-$2.10 as the death cross drives technical selling, and post-Swell profit-taking persists. </p><p>Response to this support determines whether structural strength translates to accumulation or breakdown. </p><p>A successful defense validates the bull structure and enables recovery toward $2.50-$2.70. Failure triggers correction toward $1.50-$1.70.</p><h2 class="wp-block-heading"><span id="h-mine-to-earn-gaming-meets-meme-coin-economics">Mine-to-Earn Gaming Meets Meme Coin Economics</span></h2><span class="replacer"></span><p>Post-swell volatility creates uncertainty in the altcoin market, but innovative projects keep capturing attention. </p><p><a href="https://cryptonews.com/ext/pepenode/" rel="sponsored nofollow"><strong>PepeNode</strong></a> gamifies crypto mining, where users deploy digital Miner Nodes in virtual server rooms. </p><p>Players upgrade setups to maximize $PEPENODE rewards plus PEPE and Fartcoin payouts.</p><p>The ecosystem burns 70% of the tokens spent on upgrades, which is good for the token’s upside potential.</p><figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img decoding="async" width="1024" height="628" src="https://cimg.co/p/no_image.svg" alt="XRP Price Prediction: Post-Swell Volatility - Traders Watch for Confirmation of the XRP Death Cross and Next Move" class="wp-image-449645 lazyload" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" data-src="https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-105-1024x628.jpg" data-srcset="https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-105-1024x628.jpg 1024w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-105-300x184.jpg 300w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-105-768x471.jpg 768w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-105-1536x941.jpg 1536w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-105-150x92.jpg 150w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-105-450x276.jpg 450w, https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/08101013/image-105.jpg 2048w"></figure><p>The presale nears $2 million after passing smart contract audits. </p><p>Token Generation Event and decentralized exchange listings approach, alongside on-chain mining features.</p><p>Future plans include NFT upgrades and cross-chain rewards. 				liveblog.publisher.submit_new_entry = function() {
					// Get the author name value
					var authorName = $('#liveblog-author-name').val();
					
					// Store it temporarily so we can add it to the AJAX data
					liveblog.publisher._temp_author_name = authorName;
					
					// Call the original submit function

				// Hook into AJAX to add author_name parameter

						settings.data += '&author_name=' + encodeURIComponent(liveblog.publisher._temp_author_name);
						delete liveblog.publisher._temp_author_name;
					}
				});

			}
